committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Recreation
Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Horsepasture River in the State of North Carolina as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Horsepasture River, North Carolina, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire non-Federal lands which will protect or enhance the scenic and natural values of the river.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Horsepasture River in the State of North Carolina as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
